name: reactjs-chatapp
description: Most popular chat component for react!

scripts.build: webpack -d && cp src/index.html build/index.html  && cp src/chat-style.css build/chat-style.css
scripts.dev: webpack -d src/main.js && cp src/index.html build/index.html && cp src/chat-style.css build/chat-style.css && webpack-dev-server --content-base src/ --history-api-fallback  --inline --hot
scripts.dever: webpack -d && cp src/index.html dist/index.html && webpack-dev-server --content-base src/ --history-api-fallback  --inline --hot

author: krash
